channel.title: Runes For spells, How?
channel.description:
How can i get runes needed for spells AND my ice barrage can be used by lvl 1 mages, im working on fixing it by myself but some help would be nice =/
i personally dont thing thats good

item.title: Runes For spells, How?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

This ice barrage needs runes and level, work off of it.

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 94)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
castOnPlayer.Teleblock();
inCombat();
actionTimer = 10;
stillgfx(366, absY, absX);
highalch(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX, 0, Lockon);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!");
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); 
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2); 
deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6);  
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");
}
}

Read full topic
